column4: ma guestbook photos services obituarysaugus mr. robert a. ""bobby"" mc. neil
column7: june 18th at his home in saugus. born in stoneham and raised in saugus
column8: he was the son of the late james and anne (mac. donald) mc. neil. bobby attended the bridgewell day program. he was an eagle scout and a former special olympian. mr. mc. neil leaves two brothers
column9: daniel mc. neil and his wife donna of saugus
column10: james ""duffy"" mc. neil and his wife lynda one sister-in-law
column11: jeanne mc. neil of lynn. also survived by many nieces and nephews. he was the best friend of the late ""uncle"" al le. sage. he is predeceased by one sister
column12: betty ann crowell and one brother
column13: john ""sonny"" mc. neil. in lieu of flowers donations in his memory may be made to www. dreamride. org. select donate
column14: participant larry jedrey riding for bobby. service informationrelatives & friends are invited to attend visiting hours in the bisbee-porcella funeral home
column16: saugus on monday 4-8 p. m. funeral from the funeral home on tuesday at 9:30 a. m. followed by a funeral mass in blessed sacrament church
column18: saugus at 10:30 a. m. interment woodlawn cemetery
